attributes.action: not allow local councils to charge us extra money to dispose of our household rubbish, by using bugs in wheelie bins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment is looking to put up our council tax and charge us more money to take away our rubbish. each year we pay more and more to local goverment's and now they want to put bugs in our wheelie bins to weigh our rubbish. act now to stop this ptroposal.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "not allow local councils to charge us extra money to dispose of our household rubbish, by using bugs in wheelie bins."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12951.asp

Prime Minister's Office
